mapper.select: SELECT tax_id as taxon_id, name_txt as name FROM taxon_name WHERE tax_id=#{ taxonId } AND name_class="scientific name"
SELECT name_txt as name FROM taxon_name WHERE name_txt like #{name}"%"

SELECT b.tax_id as taxon_id, b.name_txt as name FROM taxon_name b LEFT JOIN taxon_node a ON b.tax_id = a.tax_id and a.ranks like "%species%" WHERE name_txt like #{name}"%" group by b.tax_id, b.name_txt
SELECT tax_id as taxon_id, name_txt as name FROM taxon_name WHERE name_txt=#{name}
select r.accession,rdf.public_root,rdf.archived_file_dir from run r,run_data_file rdf where r.accession=#{runAcc} and r.run_id = rdf.run_id group by r.run_id

select c.accession as craAccession,r.accession as runAccession,rdf.archived_file_dir as dir from run r,run_data_file rdf,cra c where r.`status`=10 and r.release_state=2 and r.is_taxonomy=0 and rdf.public_root=2 and r.run_data_type_id=1 and r.run_id=rdf.run_id and r.cra_id=c.cra_id group by r.run_id
